SELECT release, distro, promotion_details, last("repo_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'rocky' AND "name" = 'current-tripleo-rdo' AND "distro" = 'CentOS-7') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY release, "name" fill(0)

SELECT release, distro, promotion_details, last("repo_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'queens' AND "name" = 'current-tripleo-rdo' AND "distro" = 'CentOS-7') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY release, "name" fill(0)

select component,  promo_name,  latest_build_date, promotion_details, last(aggregate_hash) from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'train' AND "component" = 'clients' AND "promo_name" = 'promoted-components' AND "distro" = 'centos-8' )

select component,  promo_name,  latest_build_date, promotion_details, last(aggregate_hash) from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'train' AND "component" = 'octavia' AND "promo_name" = 'promoted-components' AND "distro" = 'centos-8' )

select component,  promo_name,  latest_build_date, promotion_details, last(aggregate_hash) from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'train' AND "component" = 'tripleo' AND "promo_name" = 'promoted-components' AND "distro" = 'centos-8' )

panels.title: Train CentOS-8 Components: Days since last promotion

panels.description: Bars represent successful promotions to current-tripleo for ussuri.

targets.query: SELECT count("repo_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'train' AND "name" = 'current-tripleo-rdo' AND "distro" = 'CentOS-8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "name" fill(0)

panels.title: Promotions for CentOS-8 train RDO ( current-tripleo-rdo )

panels.description: List of the latest failing integration / promotion  jobs.

targets.query: SELECT "job_name","status","criteria","logs","duration","failure_reason","test_hash"  FROM "autogen"."jobs_result" WHERE ("job_type" = 'integration' AND "release" = 'train') AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Train CentOS-8-Stream  Integration periodic jobs

panels.description: Bars represent successful promotions to current-tripleo for master.

targets.query: SELECT  count("aggregate_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'train' AND "promo_name" = 'current-tripleo' AND "distro" = 'centos-7') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "name" fill(0)

panels.title: Promotions for CentOS-7 train tripleo ci ( current-tripleo )

panels.description: Bars represent successful promotions to current-tripleo for train.

targets.query: SELECT count("repo_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'train' AND "name" = 'current-tripleo-rdo' AND "distro" = 'CentOS-7') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "name" fill(0)

panels.title: Promotions for CentOS-7 train RDO ( current-tripleo-rdo)

panels.description: List of the latest failing integration / promotion  jobs.

targets.query: SELECT "job_name","status","criteria","logs","duration","failure_reason","test_hash"  FROM "autogen"."jobs_result" WHERE ("job_type" = 'integration' AND "release" = 'train' AND 'job_name' =~ /.*centos-7.*/) AND $timeFilter
